org.apache.hadoop.hbase.allocation.group
类 ServerWithGroup

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hadoop.hbase.allocation.group.ServerWithGroup

public class ServerWithGroup
extends java.lang.Object

Read group configuration from hdfs and write back to hdfs

Also provide region and table information on regionserver

构造方法摘要

方法详细信息

isIsprocess

public static boolean isIsprocess()
Used for prevent other task when there is an task processing in system This method is used for identify different tasks.

返回：
true if task is processing , false if not.

setIsprocess

public static void setIsprocess(boolean isprocess)
Set process flag

参数：
current - process flag

getCurrentserver

public static java.lang.String getCurrentserver()
Used for get current processing regionserver when change regionserver group

返回：
current processing regionserver name

setCurrentserver

public static void setCurrentserver(java.lang.String currentserver)
Set current processing regionserver name

参数：
currentserver - regionserver name

isDoMoveconf

public static boolean isDoMoveconf()
Used for identify whether regionserver is updating configuration and jars

返回：
true if system is move regionserver configuration ,else false

setDoMoveconf

public static void setDoMoveconf(boolean doMoveconf)
Set regionserver is move configuration and lib flag

参数：
doMoveconf - if system is updating regionserver configuration and library

isIsmoveregion

public static boolean isIsmoveregion()
Used for identify whether regionserver is moving regions

返回：
true if system is moving regions between regionservers , else false

setIsmoveregion

public static void setIsmoveregion(boolean ismoveregion)
Set regionserver is move region flag

参数：
ismoveregion - if system is moving regions

isIsbalance

public static boolean isIsbalance()
Used for identify whether system is balancing group or table

返回：
true if system is balancing , false if not.

setIsbalance

public static void setIsbalance(boolean isbalance)
Set system is balance group or table

参数：
isbalance - if system is balancing table or group

isIschangetable

public static boolean isIschangetable()
Used for identify whether system is change table priority or groups

返回：
true if system is changing talbe, false if not.

public static void setIschangetable(boolean ischangetable)
Set system is changing table group or priority

参数：
ischangetable - if system is change table priority or groups

true if there is error occured ,else fasle

Set error message content

getMovegroupPlanset

public static java.util.Set<MoveGroupPlan> getMovegroupPlanset()
Used for change regionserver group , MoveGroupPlan will be done by a thread ProcessMove , it will be used in front-end

返回：
current processing regionserver plans movegroupPlanset

setMovegroupPlanset

public static void setMovegroupPlanset(java.util.Set<MoveGroupPlan> movegroupPlanset)
Set current moveplan MoveGroupPlan

参数：
movegroupPlanset - current will moved regionservers

readGroupInfo

public static java.lang.String readGroupInfo(HMaster master,
                                             java.lang.String confpath)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
Read regionserver information form hdfs to a String line

Configuration file is stored in hdfs://${hbase.rootdir}/groupinformation.conf Format : groupname1;isSpecial;regionservername1;regionservername2: groupname2;isSpecial;regionservername3

参数：
master - HMaster interface
confpath - groupinformation file Path in hdfs
返回：
line Configuration File content
抛出：
java.io.IOException - IOException ocurred in hdfs

initGroupMap

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> initGroupMap(HMaster master,
                                                                                            java.lang.String confline)
Initialize groupmap for regionserver

System will delete offline regionserver from configuration file and add new online regionserver into DEFAULT_GROUP

参数：
master - HMaster interface
confline - Configuration content
返回：
groupmap Map< String, List< String >> key:groupname , value: regionserver name list

initGroupPropertyMap

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> initGroupPropertyMap(HMaster master,
                                                                                     java.lang.String confline)
Get group property grouppropertymap from configuration line ,if this group is special ,it will be set true , and when move regionserver groups ,it will force update new configuration and jars

参数：
master - HMaster interface
confline - Configuration content
返回：
grouppropertymap Map< String, Boolean > , key : groupname ,value: isSpecialConfiguration

writeGroupInfo

public static void writeGroupInfo(HMaster master,
                                  java.lang.String confpath,
                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> groupmap,
                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> grouppropertymap)
                           throws java.io.IOException
Write regionserver groupinformation back to hdfs

参数：
master - HMaster interface
confpath - Configuration file Path in hdfs
groupmap - Map< String, List< String >> key:groupname , value: regionserver name list
grouppropertymap - Map< String, Boolean > , key : groupname ,value: isSpecialConfiguration
抛出：
java.io.IOException - IOException occured in hdfs

listRegionsInServerFromMeta

public static java.util.List<org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HRegionInfo> listRegionsInServerFromMeta(HMaster hmaster,
                                                                                              java.lang.String servername)
Read region information of regionserver from .META. region

参数：
hmaster - HMaster interface
servername - regionserver name
返回：
regionlist List< HRegionInfo > , List of regions this regionserver hold

listRegionOnRegionServer

public static java.util.List<org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HRegionInfo> listRegionOnRegionServer(HMaster master,
                                                                                           java.lang.String servername)
                                                                                    throws org.apache.hadoop.hbase.MasterNotRunningException,
                                                                                           org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ZooKeeperConnectionException
Read region information stored in regionserver , we get this information directly from HRegionInterface

参数：
hmaster - HMaster interface
servername - regionserver name
返回：
regionlist List< HRegionInfo > , List of regions this regionserver hold
抛出：
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.MasterNotRunningException - master not running
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ZooKeeperConnectionException - zookeeper connection exception

listTableOnRegionServer

public static java.util.List<org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HTableDescriptor> listTableOnRegionServer(HMaster master,
                                                                                               java.lang.String servername)
                                                                                        throws org.apache.hadoop.hbase.MasterNotRunningException,
                                                                                               org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ZooKeeperConnectionException
List all online tables stored on regionserver

参数：
master - HMaster interface
servername - regionserver name
返回：
tablelist List< HTableDescriptor > , all tables hold on this regionserver
抛出：
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.MasterNotRunningException - master not running
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ZooKeeperConnectionException - zookeeper connection exception

listAllTables

public static java.util.List<org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HTableDescriptor> listAllTables(HMaster hmaster)
List all tables in hbase system

参数：
hmaster - HMaster interface
返回：
tablelist List< HTableDescriptor > , all tables hold on this regionserver

getRegionNumOnGroup

public static int getRegionNumOnGroup(HMaster hmaster,
                                      java.lang.String groupname,
                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> groupmap)
Get region number of a group

参数：
hmaster - HMaster interface
groupname - groupname
groupmap - Map< String, List< String >> ,key:groupname ,value regionserver list
返回：
totalregions , total region number hold on this group

getRegionOfTableOnServer

public static int getRegionOfTableOnServer(HMaster hmaster,
                                           java.lang.String table,
                                           org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HServerInfo server)
Get region number of a table on a regionserver

参数：
hmaster - HMaster interface
table - tablename
server - regionserver
返回：
totalregions , total region number hold on this table of this regionserver
